text: Ezɨ Akis Devitɨn akam baregha nguibar dozir mam a ganɨngi, an ziam Siklak. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Siklak a Judabar atrivibar nguibamra, ezɨ a ikia iza datɨrɨghɨn ikiavɨra iti.27:6 Mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam, “datɨrɨghɨn,” kar mɨgɨrɨgɨar en dughiamɨn otozir puvatɨzim. Puvatɨ. Kar, gumazir akɨnafarir kam osirizimɨn dughiamɨn akam.
